channel.title: Ragnarok
channel.description: Ummmm i'm just wondering if scar would work on Ragnarok. If it does, can someone make me a script for the Umbala Ore Breaking quest?

item.title: Ragnarok
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

For a TXT server (recommended for beginners, and for those who cannot do SQL):
http://www.eathena.ws/board/tutsetting-Up-An-Eathena-Text-Server-t131978.html

For a SQL server (recommended for SQL users):
http://www.eathena.ws/board/serversetting-Up-A-Sql-Server-updated-V26-t74457.html

It’s quite hard at first, but it’s extremely easy for me now.

PS: When your adding the IPS on the config files, make sure to delete the "//"s before the IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Ragnarok

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

You have absolutely no clue of what your saying.
Just Google “How to make a Ragnarok private server”

I spoke to some of my friends on ragnarok irc, they said they had no clue what scar was(obviously), but when I linked them they said it probably could happen, but may or may not work
